name: Scratchy Fx
bio: Hailing from the London massive, Scratchy FX comes with a huge line-up of Drum 'N Base and Jungle tracks for the fans!

name: Raining Zing
bio: Zing is an up and coming artist based in Zimbabwee, here in Ireland to soothe the hearts of the people with her smooth tones.

name: Three Melons
bio: The three melons are a local band debuting in the GÃ©il festival. Their signature off-time swing rock will surely get the crowd jamming!

name: The Book Goobers
bio: Old timers coming in from the US of A, these gentleman will bring the classics such as the best of ZZ Top and Black Sabbath.

name: Fedora Scores
bio: A mysterious group from Norway, not a lot is known yet but their music will certainly move you.

name: Sandy Brioche
bio: Sandy comes from the Polynesian islands to send your soul to the ether with his notes. Within the RnB scene, his music is reaching the UK charts.

name: Livvy
bio: Setting the stage on fire with memoirs of a troubled soul, Livvy is here to melt the vibes down. Wait until she hits those highs!

name: Thumann
bio: A Seattle based djent band, Thumann have come to devastate the stage and have you all in the pit. Get ready to thrash..

name: Aeriel
bio: From tech-house to deep house, Aeriel will bring the groove back on the floor. Be ready to dance the night away with solid vibes!

name: Lunar Shreds
bio: From the home of Black Metal, this Norwegian group come to snatch souls with their grim riffs and gutteral screams.
